website_summaries.verdict: Most cats like curling up in cave-like beds, but some prefer a more open design. With the Cat Bed Cube, Mittens can have it whichever way she prefers. The soft cube easily squishes down into a flat bed. And the thick organic cotton holds up to even a kitten's frisky antics.
pros: Sturdy cotton walls and floor, with a faux sherpa fleece cushion for cozy comfort
So warm and cozy, you might have to coax your kitty out for dinner
There's even a little side pocket to store Mittens' favorite catnip mouse and feather toy
cons: Not big enough for the largest cats

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this bed! First bed I have ever bought them that both cats actually use. My cats are big (19 lbs each) and they each fit inside the cube, I just had to remove the cushion. For me a HUGE bonus is that the cube fits perfectly into the Ikea Kallax shelving unit! Liked these beds so much that I bought one as a gift for a friend's cat as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sklut

customer_reviews.title: This bed is top notch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pet bed for my baby chihuahua, Dobby. He absolutely loves it. It is soft and comfortable, he feels safe inside, and it is nice and warm due to its soft plush construction. It is a chore for my wife and I to get him out of it in the morning because he doesn't want to leave it! :-) I am beyond satisfied with this bed, and so is my pup. My wife even commented that she wants a human sized one. Excellent construction. You can't go wrong with this bed. I fully endorse it and Dobby highly recommends it!
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Not sure if people understand but it do not separate , you just squash it down to flat peace. Not two parts. But still works great. My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game. Changer.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kitty cubby for our very active senior cat in the hopes of keeping her from always sleeping on the internet router in her desperate quest for warmth. She is now the queen of her very own kitten castle and spends about 40% of her day snuggled up in the warmth of the cube. The remaining 60% of her day is, of course, reserved for tail chasing, dog terrorizing, lamp breaking, and other general menace and mayhem. I would definitely put this purchase solidly in the win column. Now, if only I could find some stylish, yet unbreakable lamps.....
customer_reviews.author: Sleddogmom

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! I bought it for my brand new 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This thing is awesome! I bought it for my brand new 3 month old kittens. After setting it down, it was habituated within minutes and the first biscuits were made! Success! I will say that they loved it so much, they rolled all in and out of it, crushing in one side and leaving a narrow opening on the other. I finally decided to crush it down permanently and purchase another one to keep covered so they can choose which one they feel most comfortable in. They have been SUPER scared until they got this bed they could feel safe in. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a bit too large for the expanded cube with the cushion. I noticed her trying to get in it and struggling a bit, so I took out the cushion. I sprayed both the inside of the cube itself and the cushion with catnip spray to attract her to it after opening the box. She loves it sans cushion. She probably weighs 11 lbs or so, so she's not huge, but big enough that she couldn't turn around comfortably unless we removed the cushion. We just took it out and now the cube is her favorite spot!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lynn Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat(s) Happy Me!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed! He has been snoring happily for the last hour. Update: I need 2 more, because my other cats love it too! Update update: I bought 2 more. My cats all love their new beds. I washed the cushion of one after my cat threw up on it. I washed it with a rug, used hot water, then put it in the dryer. The cushion is a bit matted, but still fluffy. Best of all, it didn't fall apart like the Kong beds I had.
customer_reviews.author: Enlightened Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Very happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very happy with this purchase. The padding is super soft, it’s plenty roomy inside as well. I was worried it was going to be one of those things that looks big enough in pictures and then disappoints, but it was very roomy, even more than I thought it would be. The minute I opened it and set it up, my cat crawled inside and stayed in there for a long time. It’s also nice and sturdy, it’s not flimsy like some cat domes I’ve seen before. Definitely a worthy purchase, glad I took a chance on it :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandilarke

customer_reviews.title: I'll take two please!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this - they can't really decide if they like the "box" or "bed" mode more (the best is watching one attempt to turn it into a "bed" while the other is inside the "box"). Frankly, I think I need a 2nd one! *Others have pointed this out, but it helps to be clear - this is a SINGLE product that "coverts" to a "bed" or "box"; you just push it down or pop it up. It's on the small side, but great, great idea & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: James Ewen

customer_reviews.title: Cat Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year-old, 11 lbs Calico-Tiger was immediately interested but reacted in her version of shock/horror at some something she smelled as her nose passed over threshold and jerked back and won't, thus far, won't have anything more to do with it. I swapped out the cushion with one of her older beds which didn't make a difference. For the last 24 hours I've had a couple of my not so dirty t-shirts in there to try and change the scent profile. I've given this a 3 because it well made and my feline mentor may well just be waiting for the depths of winter. Will update in January.
customer_reviews.author: Minimum Ernst

customer_reviews.title: and my inside cats really love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my outdoor feral, and my inside cats really love this bed. So, now I am on here again to order 2 more. Seems my inside cats are fighting over this bed, they like it so much. The one part I did not like about this bed, is my cats keep wanting to jump on top and it smashes the top of the bed down by the weight of the cat (there is nothing hard supporting the top of the bed). But in a couple of days, the cats have learned not to jump on top, so it is is working great now.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I'm hoping my cat will start using it, unfortanately, he was more interested in the box that it came in. I think he will use if I find somewhere higher to put it. I have no complaints about the product. just my cat. My cat though is an older Male cat, maybe he would like it better if he was a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: socialdis

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua approved!
customer_reviews.text: This little house is a hit! My very picky pup loved it immediately and didn’t want to come back out. It’s made out of soft material and holds its shape better than anticipated. I’m a little disappointed that the bottom is just a really thin sheet of fabric rather than the denim that makes up the rest of the house. I suspect it may be a purposeful design to minimize moisture buildup inside. Regardless, it’s my 7lb pup’s new favorite hang out, so we highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillyn

customer_reviews.title: Bella's cat cube/bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little 2lb 3oz, Yorkie she is little because of a birth defect, all the other puppies were normal size so at 5yrs old she is in charge of every thing, she thinks. I couldn't keep her out from under the furniture because she likes the security of it I guess. So when I saw this cat cube/bed I thought I needed to try it. She totally loves it if I can't find Bella I know where she will be in her cube with her chew bone which is bigger then her. She loves sleeping on her back and there is lots of room for a much bigger dog or cat. Thanks a million
customer_reviews.author: Fran Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this kitty cube for my outdoor cat. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this kitty cube for my outdoor cat. When she's out a few days in a row in cold weather I leave her a warm bed on our porch. I'll wrap this cube in a blanket, put it in a box with a door and she'll be toasty till morning. Many thanks! This is the thickest, comfiest pet bed I've ever found!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fritz Mozart Gerald's favorite hang out.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was a little reluctant at first but now he LOVES IT! He takes his toys in with him and it's his little cave, you can only see a bit of his paws when he is sleeping but likes to stick his head out when he is just hanging out. He has plenty of room and will fit nicely even when he is full grown. It is well made but wish it had been manufactured in the Good Old USofA.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz Mozart

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have two female cats that seem to be the worst about peeing on things in my garage so I was tired of my husband complaining about his stuff....so, I have set up one of our sheds with food, water, and cat box. The shed had a kitty door already. I think it gets colder out there than the garage which gets down to 40 degrees at times. The kitty cubes were to keep the cats warm and boy do they love them. I bought three different types and yours is my black cat's favorite. Thank you for making such a nice warm place for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Researcher and Writer

customer_reviews.title: High quality bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality product & it has a very nice warm lining. I have 3 cats who refused to go into the bed for over 3 weeks. I finally took the cushion out & used a thinner pad - one by one, they each started trying it out. Now, we never know who will be in this bed. The seller also recommended using treats or catnip to entice them inside & said it is not unusual to take this time to get used to a new bed. These cats are between 10-13# and they like the small house & when curled up, they fit perfect. The seller responded immediately to my question. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Safley

customer_reviews.title: Creative idea, but pillow takes up too much space
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is about 3.5 months and is only 5 lbs. With the pillow inside it takes up way too much space. My girl prefers the pillow out, but I'm unsure if she just doesn't like the pillow in general. She doesn't seem to want to lay in it whenever the pillow is used. She tends to play with it whenever it's in cube form but because there's no pillow, there's no weight to hold the cube down. She would jump around inside the cube and would sometimes knock herself over. Overall, decent product but I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MoN

customer_reviews.title: Great little cozy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat stepped in on day two and practically lived in it for the last couple weeks of our cold season... if you can call it that in Southern California! The quality is top notch, and I love that the cotton is organic. It’s so well made. My cat is a petite 6 pounds and she had plenty of room inside. It’s been warmer lately and she hasn’t gone inside, so I’ve adjusted the bed to the open set-up. The resting area is a little smaller this way and I’m waiting to see if she gives it a try. For the moment she’s back to her favorite carpeted spots in the sun. Overall, excellent product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: MY 2 YEAR OLD CAT IS IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: She wasn't interested at first because it didn't have a familiar scent, so I took out the cushion and put in her blanket, and she instantly fell in love. She's always sleeping and resting in there. It's the perfect size and depth for my 2 year old cat. The quality is AMAZING - it's on the firmer side so it keeps its shape. BUT I must say, my cat did not like the cave version. I'm glad this gives two options though. I'd recommend to all cat owners. Seriously buy it. The best cat purchase of my life.
customer_reviews.author: NAYEON

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the greatest kitty beds I have ever seen--it's very clever how ...
customer_reviews.text: Fella loves to sleep on it all day. He's lost weight lately and hasn't been feeling well, and this bed has made an enormously positive impact on his life! This is one of the greatest kitty beds I have ever seen--it's very clever how it transforms into a cube cubby. And it's so thick and plush! It's nice looking and feels well crafted. I'm very happy with it and will be getting another one for my other kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy TalbotTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for little dogs
customer_reviews.text: Yorkies love it! Although the previous version is their favorite, both dogs love these beds (bring back the round version!!). Easy to wash, warm, comfy and plump. Nothing to complain about these amazing beds!
customer_reviews.author: H Rock

customer_reviews.title: A hit with my two
customer_reviews.text: My tiny sick cat has basically claimed this as his bed. I love that the cushion inside is removable and washable in the washing machine. My rotund cat also loves the bed, but cedes it to the tiny one when he wants it. Just this weekend tiny cat tried to get in with rotund cat, but the bed is cozy and not big enough for two.
customer_reviews.author: K. Minger

customer_reviews.title: Super Combo!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed and condo. It just was a little to small for my cat and dog. My dog is about 8 lbs. I love how it converts from the condo into the bed. The cushion is super thick and super soft. It would be perfect for a kitten or a very small dog like a chihauhau. It shipped fast. It is made real sturdy, I really liked it. Too bad it was a tad too small for my guys.
customer_reviews.author: judan7

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I, as the purchaser of the pet bed was pleased with everything about the item; however, my cat hates it. I have no clue why. I've left it in the open position and the enclosed position. She just wants nothing to do with it. I'm still trying to though. Not your fault I just have a very finicky fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nanabug

customer_reviews.title: He's in there right now
customer_reviews.text: My cat who is pretty lanky and large (15 lbs, not fat just BIG) gets inside of this and curls up and goes to sleep. It's his first bed and I wasn't sure if he would go for it. Well, he even goes into it when he has the choice of my bed and the entire house of soft furniture. I'm using it as the cube. I haven't washed it yet, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cats & Dogs

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but my cats dont.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was really cute and my cats, at least one of them, would appreciate a soft cuddly cubby... but I was wrong. It is cute, and I love the versatility, fabric, style & cushyness, but my cats aren't too fond of it. They're both afraid of the cubby, so I made it a bed. One layed on it a couple times. Now they just use it to jump down on from a perch, but only because I put it there to get some use. Thinking of washing the pillow and using it for something else, it's that soft.
customer_reviews.author: aKSamsara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9lb Jack Russell Terrier
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. She is 9lbs so she is very small. She barely fits inside, which is perfect because she likes it snug. I bought another one to keep at the office for when I take her to work. I cover the top half of the opening with a towel so she has a quiet little place to go to when she gets overwhelmed or just wants to relax. At the end of the day, I take the cushion out, fold it up, and it packs away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Louden

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but my cat doesn't care
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed but my cat could not care less. He has shown zero interest in either shape this bed takes. Maybe I'll try it in different rooms and see if that helps? It's cute and goes well with our decor, but if he literally never used it it might be a gift for someone else
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This bed is incredible! It folds into a den or cave, and folds back into a bed. I purchased this for my new tiny tea cup puppy. He loves it, in fact he loves it so much I was not sure he wanted to come out, this morning. The bed when folded into a den or cave, prevents drafts and there was a definite difference in air temperature when I placed my hand in it while he was sleeping. Definitely recommend for small dogs, puppies, cats and kittens; any critter that demands "make me a cave!", or any small critter that gets cold easily. Awesome! Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Eschel Burke

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, my Cat did not even fit. Check dimensions before buying. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Maturana

customer_reviews.title: i can haz comfy bed???
customer_reviews.text: My cats have never had such a nice bed before. Honestly, I wasn't sure they were going to go for it as a cube, which is why the option for it to be a normal bed was great. My picky cat's first reaction was OMG and she immediately went inside to sleep. She almost missed dinner because of it. I love that it is organic cotton as well. This is worth every penny, incredibly well made, and just the perfect size for one cat. It was exactly what they were missing in their lives. She is napping inside of it as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: Rae McCue

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it's good quality
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be larger than it actually is. It's quite small and we have a very tall cat. Nonetheless, he seems to be warming up to it when he decides he wants to be curled up in a cubby. It seems like it's good quality. Only time will tell. Hopefully it will be a long time before he claws it open and starts pulling its insides out!
customer_reviews.author: DroidsAreFun

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: So far the stray cat is not interested in this really new and nice snuggly feeling, state of the art, bed . But the old bed may soon disappear!! But I can appreciate how well made this bed is. It may take awhile, but it will stay on the porch. I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: sandra l norcross

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: In theory I thought this would be a good 2 in 1 product, but my cat is not a fan. When it's in bed mode it's not very soft (the sherpa pillow is, but the striped fabric on the sides isn't). The sides are stiffer than I thought they'd be, which I get they have to be to support the top and sides in box mode, but still, it's a bummer my cat won't use it. It'll cost $7+ to return so alas, I'll keep it, and hope she'll change her mind. It has a strong smell too, so that could be part of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long. Needed to get cat bed since my cat is getting older and can't jump up as much, plus he was stealing the dog's bed. I ended up switching it to the bed version instead of the cube since he didn't seem to like that. Since then I have found him in the new bed a couple times. I like the fact that it is washable, hence purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: jhbrown

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy and soft hideaway!
customer_reviews.text: This cube kitty bed was for a new 6 month old kitty I adopted. It’s a really cool little bed and feels and looks like it’s made really well. The striped exterior is kinda classic looking with its navy and white pin striped fabric. The inside and the small pillow that goes inside is super soft and cozy, like cashmere! It’s also a very nice size, not to big and can be stashed just about anywhere. Unfortunately I don’t see my cat ever go in it BUT my friend came over one day to check on my dog and said Ziggy was in there. It’s a good hiding spot for your kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Kiter Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a feral Kitten that we live trapped on the farm where I work. Someone dropped them off and left. This little guy we named "Baler" has turned out to be a GEM, he loves this bed! I have tried it both ways and he prefers to sleep on the folded down bed. It is really constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwoboxers

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old kitten loves this pet bed. I love that it converts, although my kitty likes to have it as a cat condo. It's his favorite spot to nap! It's a very high quality product that looks great too. I may have to get another one so he can have one upstairs and downstairs!
customer_reviews.author: devon dranchak

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Kitty was hogging my chair all the time- So i decided to find her a place of her own... I put this on my chair, she went in; it was love at first sight... A couple days later, i moved her apartment to the couch - She still loves it and i get my chair back :)
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Give it time.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our cat because we thought she would like a cozy place to snuggle into. She stays in the basement at night and we wanted her to have a warm place to sleep. For a month, she wouldn't touch it. I tried enticing her with treats and then with a favorite item she likes to rub against. Nothing worked. I gave up in a few days, but left the cube there. Then, this week, she decided to start using it. Now, it's where we find her all the time. If she's not eating or wanting attention (which happens rarely), she's snuggled in her cube bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pataba

customer_reviews.title: Made very well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: This looked so great and I had it all set up for my cat, but the cat never ventured inside. So, I then made it the alternate bed shape. Cat still didn't care. I put catnip on it in both configurations. No luck. I really wanted my cat to like this. It is made so well, fit perfectly within some ikea shelves that I bought. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bed! Perhaps well- fit for cats less than 12 pounds.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little bed! My chonks found it too small, wouldn't go in when it was unfolded and used as a cube, so I donated it to my local shelter. Super cute, well-constructed, materials appealing for my kitties, just small for my 12+ pound babies.
customer_reviews.author: KitterJul

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved sans pillow
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my cat doesn’t like the pillow inside so won’t use it unless the pillow is taken out. She loves it without the pillow though and I just flip it upside down so she has cushion on the bottom to lay on and just put the pillow on top of the cube to help keep heat in when it’s cold. When I put it on my bed then I put the bottom where it should be as she gets cushion from my bed. I haven’t used it pushed in like a tray type bed yet but she does love laying inside the cube ... sans pillow.
customer_reviews.author: HealthNutNerd

customer_reviews.title: Just what Max needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cat bed to comfort a very timid cat we adopted from the local humane society. (He had spent the first 2 days hiding under the basement stairs.) The bed gives him a place where he can 'hide' & be comfortable while he gets used to his new home. It seems to comfort him to be 'enclosed'. The fabric and construction look like the bed will hold up well. All in all, a great product, just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: EJR

customer_reviews.title: Soft, true to size, if you have a larger cat (15lb or bigger) this might be a bit small for them.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My cat does not leave it, she is 15yrs old and within a few hours of placing this down, she crawled in and stayed most of the night. She will choose this bed over anything else in the house, it is warm, soft and cozy for small to medium size cats. Larger cats, may have trouble fitting. My cat is about 11lb.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it in both configurations
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this as we were looking for something that could keep our kitty warm during the winter (she’s an indoor cat but it gets cold in our loft). We were worried that she wouldn’t like it because she doesn’t usually burrow into things. We eased her into the cube by making it into a bed first and putting it near the heater. After she got used to the bed (she loves to knead the spongy cushion), we turned it into a cube and--voila--she loves it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful & so worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bed! It’s adorable and looks super comfortable & cozy! My new kitten will LOVE it. I also LOVE the packaging! I was so excited when I opened the amazon box to see this how Smiling Paws presented their product to customers.
customer_reviews.author: bostongal2010

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as represented. I purchased this ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as represented. I purchased this with the intention of putting it on my "catio" for my outdoor cats, providing another place for them to seek warmth in the winter. My house cat took to it immediately -- for once he was more interested in the product than the box it arrived in -- so it might become his. Anyway, the product is well made, well insulated with the cotton filled "walls", and creatively versatile, as shown in the photographs.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Bystander

customer_reviews.title: Kitten size
customer_reviews.text: I have seven cats...various ages...not a one is interested in this bed..tried in multiple locations...I would say this would probably work for a small female or a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bed we've ordered. They currently aren't availalble. I'd like to order one more. We have a 15 year old dsh female who is gradually becoming more accepting of two 8 month old kittens that we adopted a couple of months ago. We've been letting them in her room and they have hogged the bed. Now, instead of sharing the bed like in the picture they are each taking one. I need one more so they can all have their own. Edit: 6/14/2018. We have four beds now, one for each of our cats.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousAmazonian

customer_reviews.title: ... bed for my cat so she could have a nice and warm place to sleep
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to find a bed for my cat so she could have a nice and warm place to sleep. This bed caught my eye, it reminded me of a borg cube(from star trek). I love that it can go from a flat bed to the cube. I love that there is a side pocket too. The pillow that comes with it is very soft and comfortable. My flatmates cat also loves it and tries to sleep in it whenever he can.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Desimone

customer_reviews.title: We use the version that looks like a little cave
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this bed. At first he wasn't sure, but now he spends at least 12 hours a day napping in. We use the version that looks like a little cave. He seems to like the warmth of it. I would recommend it if you have a smaller kitty.
customer_reviews.author: bizobnstl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my three newly rescued kittens
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my three newly rescued kittens. They LOVE it in cube form-- a comfy hide-away after a long day of play. I can see they will also love as adult cat -- perhaps two will be able to share. It can be popped into the washing machine and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cat and Kitty Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an outside cat but the moment it was opened and placed on the floor it was claimed by the inside princess and we haven't seen her for days! Bought a second one, made it out to the intended recipient - only comes out for meals! Not sure what magic is happening inside these cubes but the cats love them! Quality is high and they are cute as well, very highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mel E

customer_reviews.title: Kitten's favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: Our kittens are like magnets to this when they're tired and want to go to sleep. They prefer it compacted so they can see all around, and love to rest their heads against the sides. The cushion is soft and fluffy enough that they love to nuzzle and are constantly purring in this. May need to buy another when they're too big to both fit in one!
customer_reviews.author: Joe A. Horine

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my 5lb yorkie-sized puppy. Before, she would only sleep in my bed burrowed under all my blankets for maximum warmth, and we would constantly wake each other up. She’s loved this bed instantly since the day we got it and it stays warm enough that she loves sleeping in there. I feel like she has her own little room, and the flexibility to transform it into a standard dog bed is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy & Both Our Kitties Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I just surprised my kitties with this new bed and they both love it. Didn’t take very long for them to claim it. I also love that it’s a 2 in 1 bed and hideaway box. It feels sturdy and I like the striped fabric. Another great thing is that it can be easily laundered.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves her new bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for Carl, the oldest of our 3 outdoor cats who we brought inside about 6 months ago. She (yes, Carl is a girl) had always stayed in the crawl space under our house, so I thought she might like a nice, cozy pod to sleep in. Initially I had to kind of shove her inside and show her that it wasn't a carrier and she wasn't going to the vet, but as soon as she realized that she was safe, she curled up and went to sleep. The only time she comes out is to eat and use the litter box!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Sonsini

customer_reviews.title: Warm Soft and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Warm, soft and cozy! I ordered this for a sweet kitty with feline leukemia who belongs to someone else. As winters are cold here, this kitty is sure to stay warmer with this comfy cat bed. I heard from the folks who have the cat, he really seems to like the bed and is using it already! Great follow up from vendor which is always much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm Kube for Kitties
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get our four kitties out of the cat cubes. All four tried to fit in one. We had to buy another cat cube. Instead of disorder in the house (cube) we now have no more than two to a cube. We suggest having a bigger one for multiple cats or bigger felines. Thanks!! Update - added photos of 1, 2, and 3 Cornish Rex cats in one cube. They love it because it is so warm.
customer_reviews.author: catbert666

customer_reviews.title: My turn, no my turn...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not whether I like it , although I do , it’s do the cats like it and they took turns with such rapidity that I ordered another one. Now no waiting!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bed is extremely well-made and versatile. It took our cat a few days to go inside the "cave", but once inside she loved it. (I'm glad she's cautious!) If you're looking for a really nice bed, one your cat/kitten will enjoy, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: My two cats and dog are constantly jostling over who gets to use this bed. Best pet bed I've purchased. Sturdy construction with the one exception of the bottom cloth that could be thicker. However the pattern is lovely and outside pocket a cute detail. I wish they made these human sized!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed no matter how you use it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little cat bed. We got it for a feral cat that guards the outside of our house, and although she didn't care for the cushion, she loves to hunker down in the bed part without the cushion. I loved that it was machine washable, and although she didn't like the insert, it felt amazingly good to me. Might splurge on a second for a headcase of an indoor cat that might love the "cave" formation for the bed.
customer_reviews.author: mandeelea

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have cats who are afraid to try anything new. When these came, I immediately unpacked and placed them where the cats sleep. One of the cats was in it the first night and the other took a couple of days to accept it. Now both sleep in their cat cubes every night.
customer_reviews.author: DWright

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cat bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes the cube as a cozy place to sleep, and I like the fact that it is well made and seems likely to last a long time. One suggestion: Make this in two sizes. This size will accommodate most cats, but it is a snug fit for a larger cat like mine. A larger size cube -- maybe 15x15x15? -- would give him more wiggle room and I think he would like that a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I went through several cat beds before ordering this one. My cat wasn't interested in any of those but she started using this one right away and loves it. I love that it's cute and durable. It comes out of the wash like new and the stitching is well done. The material is also soft. Seems to hold in a lot of heat while she's using it (don't know how it does in warm weather yet). Couldn't be happier with this cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my chihuahua she goes inside and lays on top. She liked it right away, it's not flimsy at all and it retains it shape well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Maybe more for a kitten?
customer_reviews.text: I liked this but had to return it because the house-style was just not even remotely possible for our adult female cats. I would say this fits more for a kitten. Either way, it was cute. Wish they had an XL size.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The cat condo arrived in perfect condition and is well made. I have two Main Coons and so far they have looked it over but neither has tried it yet. However I bought a bed several months a go and it was ignored for several weeks. Now it's used constantly. I feel that after it's been here a while this condo will also get used. It just takes time!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schwartzwald

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge bed, but the cat it's meant for is not very big. She likes "cave"-like beds, so this was perfect. We now just have to entice her into it!
customer_reviews.author: Mgmt NinjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made cat cube although it isn't for large cats. I have 4 cats and 3 of them are under 10 lbs. and they all fit into this house very well but my larger cat, Barney, is way too big for it....he's 18 lbs. and very large-boned so I will need to buy him a larger one. Am very pleased with the sturdy construction and the softness of this cube.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute bed. A couple of concerns. I think it’s a bit small. I have a 4-5 month old kitten and he may out grow it. Also, I convert mine a couple of times a day. I feel the stiffness of keeping it open is starting to diminish and have noted some sagging already. I changed my review bc my cat absolutely loves this!! He sleeps on it, scratches, plays with it. I don’t expand it but he loves the sides to rest his head on.....
customer_reviews.author: Susie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: what a great bed.
customer_reviews.text: We love the fact that this bed can be made 2 different ways. We were also that the quality was also great. thank you our cat loves it....
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Brings his favorite toy in there and sleeps with it
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and cozy, it's advertised for cats, but we got it for our little Yorkie . He absolutely loves it. Brings his favorite toy in there and sleeps with it. Or just hangs out on the soft pillow inside watching tv from the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: With 2 options your cat can choose which one he/she likes best. My cat snuggles right in and can watch the world go by from a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Himitsu

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, super cushy pillow but very small bed
customer_reviews.text: Two of my 4 cats went over to it immediately and the smallest went in and laid down right away. The inside has a super cushy pillow but do look at the dimensions. It's really small...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product and our fur baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great! We actually got it for our 9 lb min-pin/rat terrier senior dog. Yes, I said dog. She loves snuggling inside her dog caves. We got this to take when we go on road trips. Collapsed when in the car and opened up when in the hotel and it fits perfectly in her crate (at our favorite Airbnb she has to be crated if we leave her alone, not long though, I promise). Well made, soft on the inside and durable on the outside. It’s perfect and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Asher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Our two large cats used it within an hour of unpacking. Fits great in 13x13 inch cube storage furniture. My only complaint is the fabric on the bottom of the cube is very thin and made of material that one cat loves to tear up.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kitty, he's 5 lbs and fits in there beautifully. I think it may be too small for fur babies over 10-12 lbs. It's wonderfully made and my kitty LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved sitting inside of it but he is too big to fit on top of it sadly had to return it. Very good quality nicely made and cozy. Wish it was a bit bigger and had different color options.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Omg my kitten loves this bed-its awesome great quality-super soft would buy their products again and again
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems fine. Bought it for my older cat, but is picky & has no interest in it. Thankfully, my younger cat is starting to take a shine to it. Update: older cat finally took to it. And she is so cute in there. She prefers it in cube form rather than bed form.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly cat to take refuge in and by the end of the first week ordered a second one for my much younger cat. They both love hunkering down inside, more importantly, I love them. The construction is very sturdy and the delivery was very prompt. Thanks for a great product from LC and Henri.
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for smallest pets
customer_reviews.text: Over all it’s a very good product. But for smaller cats and maybe even teacup sized dogs. I have two adult cats 19 yrs and 12 yrs old. Neither of them fit inside without being cramped.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB312

customer_reviews.title: Kitties Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a winner in my household - These arrived the same day we rescued our 2 kitties, and they immediately took a liking to them, as they probably felt safe in the cushy house. Seem very comfortable and they still use them weeks later!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Herr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cozy  cat cave.
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it. He needed a little cozy private spot. He got in, curled up a purred himself to sleep. It is exactly as pictured, well made and has plenty of room for my 15 pound boy with the cushion in it.
customer_reviews.author: bluesdiva

customer_reviews.title: Better than sleeping on my legs!
customer_reviews.text: My cat and my husband's cat (both around 2 years old, 8-10 pounds) always sleep on my legs at night. And because I'm afraid to disturb them, I try my best not to move. This results in leg cramps. I purchased this bed for my cat who is the lighter sleeper. She took to it immediately! I move it around the house during the day, depending on which room I'm in, and she always returns to sleep in it. But most importantly she sleeps in it almost all night, which means I'm free to move again! I'll be purchasing another one soon because she smacks my husband's cat whenever she tries to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Millet

customer_reviews.title: Clever dual purpose product
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit for our cat to wander in there but now he loves it without the pillow though. I don't know why he won't go near it when I put the pillow in but as soon as I take it out he's back in. I haven't used it pushed down as a bed but I guess the dual purpose is clever and maybe down the road he'll use it. It will be interesting to see how it washes.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: My cats really love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these cubes. I put them in the back of the closet or behind a chair so they can hide out in their “cave.”
customer_reviews.author: Susan Price

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats of varying sizes
customer_reviews.text: I was originally concerned that this bed would not work for my 10 year-old Russian Blue, who only weighs 10 lbs but is very long. As others have said, cats find a way to fit themselves into tiny spaces. It took him a day or two to warm up to it but he now loves to take refuge in there and I love seeing his little head poke out of the entrance when I walk by. The removable liner is perfect to keep them warm during the winter, knowing you can take it out during the warmer months.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was inside the cube as soon as it was unwrapped. It's been about two weeks and she spends at least 10 hours a day in it. Only downside is that the other cat is jealous and keeps sneaking in. So, I have to buy another one. This cost a bit more than some of the other beds I was considering. But my girls are worth it. So happy that I paid a few extra dollars for the better product.
customer_reviews.author: Tami L. Harween

customer_reviews.title: kind of small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 lb chihuahua and she just fits in it. she hasn't tried to go in it yet, but uses it when the top is folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cat does not like it, even sprinkled with catnip update: the cat has finally adopted the bed. She won't sleep on the bed/on my head anymore. Not sure this is a plus. I would buy a second one if the color scheme was better. The bedding taupe color is clashing with the stripped walls.
customer_reviews.author: Edmee M

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and it protects from the wind and cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these because the first one was so fabulous and the neighborhood cat needed one too. It's soft, plush, warm, sturdy and it protects from the wind and cold. I highly recommend this cat bed and cube!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E

customer_reviews.title: Great bed - ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, just as described. We cannot keep our 5 pound dog out of his "man cave" - he loves it. This is a substantial bed, when used as the cube, stays upright - very sturdy. Only wish they offered a large size for our dog that's a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: catherine c.

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat stole my other kitties cube bed. I bought this one and they both love it
customer_reviews.author: Linis2

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep my older cat warm
customer_reviews.text: My older cat sleeps in our garage by her choice. But this year I worried she was going to get too cole despite an outdoor heating pad under her bed. But this is wonderful. So far it’s keeping the heat from underneath trapped in the box. And she loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JesW

product_meta.title: Smiling Paws Cat House & Cat Condo For Indoor Cats - Quality Washable Small Pet Bed that can be configured as a Cat Cave or a popup Cat Tent - A 2in1 Covered Cat Bed Cave & Cat Cube For Indoor Cats
feature_bullets: 𝐘𝐎𝐔 𝐀𝐑𝐄 𝐆𝐎𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐓𝐎 𝐋𝐎𝐕𝐄 𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐀𝐓 𝐁𝐄𝐃: Some kitties love beds with wide-open views. Others prefer snuggling in a cozy cave. Our 2-in-1 Cat Bed design offers both choices, so you can accommodate your cat's whim du jour.
PREMIUM COMFORT: The inner lining and included cushion is made from extremely fine dual spun faux Sherpa creating an unparalleled cloud sensation that is soft, cozy and breathable!
BETTER QUALITY: Forget those cheaply made cat beds you buy over and over again. This cat house furniture is made up from premium padded cotton walls for shape-keeping durability.
WASHABLE TOO: Toss your cat condo in the washing machine OR spot-clean with a damp sponge. Either way, it's easy-care... and it keeps fur and dander off of your furniture!
PRODUCT DETAILS: Recommended for cats and small dogs. 13”x13x”13” (cube formation). Made from Polyester & Cotton, Filling: Polyester. Free from flame retardants, toxins and chemicals.
